participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Emily is energetic and passionate about fitness, always looking for new challenges. She has a nurturing side and enjoys sharing her vegetarian recipes with friends.
participant_1.background: i am married. i enjoy sports such as running. i'm a vegetarian. my favorite color is blue. i am a woman.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is laid-back and humorous, often making people laugh with his quirky jokes. He has a creative side that comes out during his live action roleplaying events.
participant_2.background: i like donuts. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events. i play a lot of call of duty. i drive a ford pinto. my favorite band is the insane clown posse.
